forum.content:
我跟很多學英文的人聊過天，貌似每個人都對這個主題有興趣。
I've talked to a lot of people who are/were learning English, and this seems to be something that almost everyone is interested in knowing.

我不能代表所有英語母語者(不是因爲英文不是我的母語，而是這聊天習慣因人而異)，不過幾乎所有英語係國家的人聊天時多少都會用簡寫。
I can't speak for all native speakers (not because I'm not one myself, but because it depends on personal chatting habit), but almost every native speakers more of less uses abbreviations when texting.

我個人很愛用簡寫，因為可以省很多時間，譬如，一個10個字母的片語我只需要打3個字母。
I personally love to use abbreviations because they save me a lot of time to type out, let's say, a phrase with 10 letters, with just 3 letters.

以下我快速的列了一個我比較常用的簡寫的清單，我現在能想到的。
So here's a quick list of some abbreviation I could think of right now from the top of my head that I frequently use.

-----------------
馬上回來
Brb- be right back

先走了/我需要離開了
Gtg/g2g- got to go

明天
Tmr- tomorrow

不用擔心
Dw- don't worry

謝謝
Thx- thanks

沒問題
Np- no problem

謝謝你
Ty- thank you

好好玩/慢走
Hf- have fun

晚安
Gn- good night

待會聊/晚點聊
Ttyl- talk to you later

因為
Cuz(b/c)- because

順帶一提
Btw- by the way

老實說
Tbh- to be honest

我不知道
Idk- I don't know

我不在意
Idm- I don't mind

我不在乎
Idc- I don't care

現在
Rn- right now

現在
Atm- at the moment

【06-16 Update 更新】

笑出聲來/開懷大笑/哈哈
Lol- laugh out loud

笑到屁股掉下來
Lmao- laugh my ass off

笑到我他媽的屁股掉下來
Lmfao- laugh my f**king ass off

有意願打炮 (credit: Wei)
Dtf- down to f**k

啥小？
Wtf- what the f**k

什麼鬼？
Wth -what the hell

跟/一起
W/ - with

沒有某人事物
W/o或w/out - without

慢玩祝好運
Hfgl- have fun good luck

【06-18 Update 更新】

我的天啊/我ㄊㄇㄇㄉ天啊 (credit: Claire)
(註: 非宗教選擇可用"goodness"代替"God")
Omg/omfg - oh my god/oh my f**king god
(Ps. "God" can be replaced with "goodness" as an non-religious option)

搖頭- 表示不滿或不同意 (credit: Claire)
Smh- shake/shaking my head

拜託
Pls- please

啥小？ (開玩笑時使用，語氣較輕)
Defuq- the f**k

閉嘴(語氣偏重,除非跟好友或真的很生氣,不要用)
Stfu- shut the f**k up
(註: 單純shut up沒有簡寫,別用"SU"沒人會懂)

開玩笑的
Jk- just kidding

越快越好/盡快 (工作上有時有會使用到)
Asap- as soon as possible

我不知道 (以前網路用語，現在較少見）
iono- I don't know

我個人意見
imo- in my opinion

【06-20 Update 更新】

對吧？/ 真~的~ (表示同意) Credit: Sam
ikr- I know, right?

滾開
Gtfo- get the f**k off

為什麼
Y- why

在路上了/我正要過去
Omw- on my way

我的不對/我搞錯了
Mb- my bad

算了/沒事
Nvm- never mind

在現實生活中
irl- in real life

年齡/性別/地點
ASL- age/sex/location
（註: 這是在用Omegal跟Chatroulette和陌生人配對聊天或視訊的時候對方會問的問題）
--------------------

希望這些有幫助
如果喜歡就給個「讚」吧🙋🏻‍♂️ 謝謝
Hope this is helpful :))
Give me a like if you think it's interesting. Thx!
forum.title: 簡寫 Abbreviations/Acroyms 💁🏻‍♂️ (已翻譯)
